mapper.select: select movcode, movname, movdirector, movgenre, movgrade, movrunningtime, to_char( movrelease,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일' ) as movrelease, movposter, filename, uploadpath, fullname from movies
mapper.insert: insert into movies(movcode, movname, movdirector, movgenre, movgrade, movrunningtime, movrelease, fileName, uploadPath, fullname ) values(seq_movcode.nextval, #{movname}, #{movdirector}, #{movgenre}, #{movgrade}, #{movrunningtime}, #{movrelease}, #{fileName}, #{uploadPath}, #{fullname})
mapper.select: select movcode, movname, to_char( movrelease,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일' ) as movrelease, movposter, filename, uploadpath, fullname, movrunningtime from movies where movname like '%'|| #{movname} || '%'
mapper.update: update movies set movname = #{movname}, movdirector = #{movdirector}, movgenre = #{movgenre}, movgrade = #{movgrade}, movrunningtime = #{movrunningtime}, movrelease = #{movrelease}, filename = #{fileName}, uploadPath = #{uploadPath}, fullname = #{fullname} where movcode = #{movcode}
